${modID}:PowerID.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

${modID}:Kindle.NAME: Kindle
DESCRIPTIONS: At #b10 stacks, #yErupt the enemy dealing #b30 damage to it and #b15 to ALL others.

${modID}:Cure.NAME: Cure
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal HP equal to your stacks of #yCure at the end of your turn. Taking damage causes you to lose half of your #yCure stacks unless you were at full health at the end of your turn.
